items.title: BitGo Moves Toward NYSE Debut After $4.19 billion H1 2025 Revenue
items.excerpt: BitGo has filed an S-1 and signaled plans to list on the NYSE under ticker BTGO after reporting $4.19 billion in revenue for H1 2025. The filing outlines the companyâ€™s financial performance, governance structure and strategic priorities as it prepares for a public offering.
